thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Frank
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Frank

author: Frank
title: Frank
text:
I was very reserved about entering into a consumer proposal, but after meeting & speaking with Rhoda of their Mississauga office a few times about my situation, she comforted me into making the decision to enter into it.
Looking back I am glad I did. The cash flow improvement alone is a big help, let alone seeing my debt load decrease considerably as the months pass.
Many thanks Rhoda for your assistance and on going support!
